optionsTabsSiteInputTT.message: Enter any part of the <title> or URL that needs to match in order to trigger rules in this profile

optionsTabsHotkeyInputTT.message: Press a hotkey combo used to execute this profile

optionsFieldsNameColTooltip.message:
• Matchable attributes:
    • name
    • id
    • title
    • placeholder
    • aria-label
    • aria-labelledby
    • aria-describedby
    • data-bind
    • data-reactid
    • ng-model
    • value (checkbox/radio inputs only)
    • src (same-origin iframes only)
    • class
  • CSS selectors are supported to select by element.
  • Regular Expressions can be used to match attributes.
    • Reserved characters: ^ $ . ? + * \ | ( ) { } [ ]
      (add a \ before these to match the literal character)
    • Match is case insensitive.
  • Everything between /* and */ is ignored.

optionsFieldsValueColHelp.message: Text to autofill or code to execute.

optionsFieldsValueColTooltip.message:
• If Type = Select, enter the menu item's text/value in double quotes or index number to auto-select. For multi-select listboxes, separate each selection with a pipe (|); enter ! to select all or leave blank to unselect all. Enter ? to select a random item.
  • If Type = Checkbox/Radio, enter 1 to check or 0 to uncheck. Add ! at the end to check/uncheck all items. Enter ? to randomly toggle.
  • If Type = JavaScript, enter JavaScript code. It will be evaluated last.

optionsFieldsSiteColHelp.message: Document title or URL required to trigger autofill.

optionsFieldsSiteColTooltip.message:
• This overrides the profile site filter.
  • Put multiple filters on separate lines (or use "|").
  • Regular Expressions are supported.
    • Reserved characters: ^ $ . ? + * \ | ( ) { } [ ]
      (add a \ before these to match the literal character)
    • Match is case insensitive.

optionsFieldsModeColTooltip.message:
• Safe – fill only empty fields
  • Overwrite – fill all fields, even if non-empty
  • Prepend – insert Value at the beginning of field
  • Append – insert Value at the end of field
  • Wrap – insert Value at the beginning and end of field
  • Increment – add 1 to existing number
  • Decrement – subtract 1 from existing number

optionsFieldsSelectProfile.message: Select a profile to move the highlighted autofill rule to.

optionsAdvancedIntro.message: Here you can configure advanced profile and rule options. Each line needs to follow this syntax: profile/rule ID: all=true|false delay=0.5-60 forcefill=true|false (click on Help for more information).

optionsExceptionsIntro.message: There may be pages you don't want Autofill activated on. Enter any part of the document title or URL of these pages below, with one entry on each line. Regular Expressions are supported.

optionsImportExportIntro.message: To import settings into Autofill, paste the CSV data into the box below and click Import. To export the current settings to a CSV file, click Export, copy the generated data, paste it into a text editor, and save the file with extension .csv.

optionsTextClipsIntro.message: Text clips can be inserted into text fields via the right-click context menu. The first line defines the menu item in this syntax: category (optional) > title. Separate each text clip with === on its own line.

optionsVariablesIntro.message: Here you can define variables to reuse across multiple rules. Each line needs to follow this syntax: variable_name = some text (click on Help for more information). To use a variable in a rule, enter {@variable_name}.

optionsImportUrl.message: To import settings from a remote file, enter the file's URL below. The file must be in plain text format and have the same structure as the exported CSV data.

optionsImportAutoImport.message: Auto-import settings from the URL above when the <u>b</u>rowser starts

optionsOtherBackup.message: B<u>a</u>ck up text fields larger than

optionsOtherBackupCharsInputTT.message: Set the minimum number of characters to back up

optionsOtherBackupHelp.message: Automatically save text fields in case Chrome crashes.

optionsOtherManualHelp.message: Trigger Autofill only when you select a profile.

optionsOtherDelaySecInputTT.message: Set the number of seconds to wait before autofilling

optionsOtherDelayHelp.message: Add a delay before autofill rules are executed.

optionsOtherLabelMatchHelp.message: Try to match a text label even without the <tt>for</tt> attribute.

optionsOtherOverwriteHelp.message: Set the default form fill method to Overwrite.

optionsOtherVarsHelp.message: Replace a <tt>{…}</tt> variable with its output. Click on Help for more info.

optionsOtherSoundHelp.message: Play sound effects after every autofill operation.

optionsOtherVoiceHelp.message: Hear the Wizard speak after generating autofill rules.

optionsOtherDebugHelp.message: Show debugging messages in the Chrome console.

optionsOtherScaleHelp.message: Resize the rules table to the window height to reduce scrolling.

optionsOtherMenuHelp.message: Access Autofill from the right-click context menu.

confirmProfileDelete.message:
Would you like to delete all rules inside this profile as well?

Click OK to proceed or Cancel to delete only the profile and move all rules to Unfiled.

statusHotkeyDuplicate.message: This hotkey is already assigned to profile "___". Please try another hotkey combo.

statusProfileCharLimit.message: Profile name cannot be over 60 characters.

statusProfileReserved.message: This profile name cannot be used.

statusImportFailed.message: Import failed – see Help for correct CSV format.
